title: Facing Rising Rates, Insurers Turn to Private Assets, Real Estate — Even Crypto
description: The world’s largest investors — insurers — are relatively optimistic about the investment landscape, despite rising concerns about inflation. In the latest episode of Exchanges at Goldman Sachs, Mike Siegel, global head of the insurance asset management and liquidity solutions businesses in Goldman Sachs Asset Management, breaks down the results of the firm’s latest insurance survey.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
